question: My beard grows in sections
answer:
QUESTION

my beard grows in sections,not fully.i won't shave my beard,because i know it's haram to.what is allowed as far as grooming it and keeping it neat and even?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

In principle, it is not permissible for you to cut the hair along the jawbone unless it exceeds a fistful. Any hair that grows on the cheeks or throat may be removed, although it is better not to do so. You cannot groom your beard by trimming it to make it even.

(Fatawa Mahmoodiya, 19/394-396, 412, Farooqiyah)

ولا يحلق شعر حلقه وعن أبي يوسف رحمه الله تعالى لا بأس بذلك ولا بأس بأخذ الحاجبين وشعر وجهه ما لم يتشبه بالمخنث
الفتاوى الهندية، 5/438، العلمية))



And Allah knows best

Wassalamu Alaikum

Ml. Sajid bin Shabbir,
Student Darul Iftaa
